document.full_text: bahraini shi'ites say they have endured a reign of terror during 11 weeks of martial law imposed to break up a pro-democracy movement that for the first time threatened the control of a sunni-ruled gulf arab dynasty.
document.title: bahrain shi'ites talk of abuse under martial law
lines_and_colors: bahraini shi'ites say they have endured a reign of terror during 11 weeks of martial law imposed to break up a pro-democracy movement that for the first time threatened the control of a sunni-ruled gulf arab dynasty.
